basic_info.description: I'm a passionate web developer with deep expertise in Shopify and its ecosystem, including Shopify Plus and third-party integrations. I've had the opportunity to work on significant projects for renowned international brands, which has sharpened my skills in delivering top-tier e-commerce solutions. This experience has equipped me with the expertise needed to handle high-profile projects and meet the demanding standards of global clients. Over 30 stores for notable brands have benefitted from my expertise, including Bebe, Katy Perry, Hurley, Kenneth Cole, Pam & Gela, Shock Doctor, Scotch & Soda, Modcloth and many others.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.description: A few live stores I have collaborated with to date: https://bebe.com, https://bloomist.com, https://brookstone.com, https://flipsandal.com, https://fredericks.com, https://hurley.com, https://junkfoodclothing.com, https://karenkane.com, https://modcloth.com, https://scotchandsoda.com

projects.title: Bebe
projects.description: Bebe is a globally recognized fashion brand known for its trendy and sophisticated apparel. As a Shopify Specialist and Frontend Developer, I spearheaded the redesign of their online store, meticulously preserving the brand's original style while enhancing its digital presence. Without a Figma mockup, I collaborated closely with the client to align the design with their vision, ensuring a seamless user experience. This project, with its high revenue and international reach, stands as a testament to my ability to deliver impactful e-commerce solutions.

projects.title: Pet Rescue
projects.description: A challenging app where I polished my CSS skills using styled-components to achieve the best look. Application registers the users, dogs and shelters on Firebase. The users are able to login/signup with Google account, review each dog card and shelter info where is hosted, select their favorites that get stored on a screen refreshed by Redux and edit their profile data.

projects.title: Flight Reservation
projects.description: I learned many technologies developing this app and my code was reviewed by mentors. Users are able to login/signup with a Google account, I used styled-components, Yup to build schema, Formik to validate the formularies, i18next framework to specify text and Redux to refresh the ticket screen.

projects.title: Omnifood
projects.description: One of my first landing pages, great to put into practice pure CSS, animations and semantic HTML for SEO positioning. I applied the best practices on web design rules, implementing queries to make the website responsive and suitable for tablets and mobiles as well.

projects.title: Budgety
projects.description: Budget calculator created with Javascript vanilla. I made it as part of an Udemy course, it was really great to work with IIFE, many arrays/objects methods and DOM manipulation. Also to apply the Object Oriented Programming and functional paradigm.
